title: The Supreme Court Decides In Favor Of A Racial Slur...Now What?
description: The U.S. Supreme Court recently decided in favor of Simon Tam, front man of the band The Slants. The group has been fighting the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office for nearly a decade, for the right to use the slur.
